name: Soos Ramirez
info:
• 简体中文名: 苏斯·拉米雷斯
  • 别名: Jesus "Soos" Alzamirano Ramirez
  • 别名: Soos
  • 性别: 男
  • 生日: 1990-07-13
  • 引用来源: http://gravityfalls.wikia.com/wiki/Soos_Ramirez
detail: Jesus "Soos" Alzamirano Ramirez is the awkward, lovable, and friendly man-child who works as the Mystery Shack's handyman, in addition to other odd jobs. He often accompanies Dipper and Mabel on their adventures.
